messages.message:
We are running into issues with errors in Crafting sandboxes with uploading files. If you see a bunch of errors in the tests run on your PR from tests like run-app, run-public-app, aihub-single classification, take these steps:

1. Go to https://instabase.sandboxes.site/sandboxes
2. Search for your PR number and delete the sandbox
3. Go to the details for the run failing run Cypress test and select "Re-run all jobs", which will create a new sandbox
Thanks @CJ and @sean.donohoe for investigating this! Hopefully we'll have this root caused and fixed soon.

While I go to IT and get access to crafting, can someone help get the sandbox for PR#57149 (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/57149) deleted?

A bunch of tests on my PR are failing and I was able to go into the sandbox and confirm that they pass.
